column1: 63101919$Tempest Magician$$DARK$[Spellcaster/synchro]$$$$$6$2200$1400$$1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner Spellcaster-Type monsters$$When this card is Synchro Summoned
column2: place 1 Spell Counter on it. Once per turn
column3: you can discard any number of cards to place 1 Spell Counter on a monster(s) you control for each card you discarded. You can remove all Spell Counters on the field to inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each removed Spell Counter.$$$$$

column1: 94886282$Charge of the Light Brigade$$SPELL$$$$$$$$$Normal$$$Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard; add 1 Level 4 or lower "Lightsworn" monster from your Deck to your hand.$$$$$
